statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={158.9}{e}^{{{0.0311}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0311}}\approx{1.0315886575945}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0315886575945}-{1}={0.031588657594511}\approx{0.0316} and the percent is 3.16.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
